author: alexandair
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

As about_ articles are just .txt files and don't have a HelpUri attached to them, why can't we with Update-Help download an additional text file with the mappings about_topic<->Uri for all about_ articles. When we specify -Online, Get-Help could get the Uri from that file.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_
title: Add Get-Help -Online support for the about_ topics
